content: try out this crochet slime applique pattern link to youtube video https //youtu be/5tuas72lrdy skill level easy/intermediate format pdf and video stitches and abbreviations this pattern is written in us terminology st/sts stitch/stitches chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet tools and materials -5 mm crochet hook -bernat premium #4 worsted medium -green -yarn needle -scissors final size - diameter of 11 cm
